data.subject: Forever Down
data.lyric:
Take a look inside the warped and the sick
 Forever born again just to die so quick
 The floodgates

data.subject: Suicide Messiah
data.lyric:
Crawl through the flames that eat your flesh
 Drowned in the waters that know you best
 Step inside

data.subject: What`s In You
data.lyric:
Step inside this nightmare where I live
 The madman rolls inside my head
 
 Oh, what's in you now
 H

data.subject: Fire It Up
data.lyric:
Fire It Up
 Let the engines roll
 It's time to burn it down
 Keep bleeding on 'til the day you die

data.subject: 비둘기 (Feat. 장래혁)
data.lyric:
흑인 흉내 내려 네가 했던 병신 뻘짓 
 몸뚱이가 불어 나는 
 나를 보고 섬짓 놀라기엔 
 시기상조 입니다라 말을 해도 
 토끼 눈을 부릅 뜬 
 넌 오늘 역시 멈칫 
 가나다라

data.subject: 닌자 (NINJA) (Feat. 엄프)
data.lyric:

 적들에게 십자 수리검을 휙휙
 가짜 MC들은 뒤에서만 씩씩
 검은 표범 움직임에 눈이 핑핑
 표창을 날려 휙휙
 적들에게 십자 수리검을 휙휙
 가짜 MC들은 뒤

data.subject: Yanada
data.lyric:
People say it's not cool
 To be sweet like you
 They wanna wrecking in a moment
 Keep you cynical

data.subject: My Secret Life
data.lyric:
This is my confession it came to me late last night
 I want you to understand baby you are my secret

data.subject: Can`t Kill The Boogieman
data.lyric:
Crazy lazy days back in The UK
 Art school we wore a gang sweatshirt
 Guess what it said
 My politic

data.subject: Broken Records
data.lyric:
Broken records on the ground
 Paris traffic spinning round and round
 So I stood there with James Br
